name: Ariel Caicedo
description:
Hello, I am currently a Sophomore at HackNC University. Coming from a Hispanic background, I've come to enjoy learning new languages and teaching others about them too.
My hobbies include biking and playing bowling. I would love to help you out with anything I can!

name: Abram Jackson
description:
Hello, I am currently a Sophomore at HackNC University. I've always wanted to be a scientist, but I now realize that there are other subjects more than just science that I enjoy!
My hobbies include cooking and... eating! I would love to help you out with anything I can!

name: Julia Wu
description:
Hello, I am currently a Sophomore at HackNC University. I'm a literature major and a biology minor, and I love showing others how these two subjects can be combined.
My hobbies include reading and playing the piano! I would love to help you out with anything I can.

name: Adam Smirnov
description:
Hello, I am currently a Sophomore at HackNC University. I love learning about other countries and cultures, and would love to learn with you as well!
I love travelling the world as well as reading a good book. I would love to help you out with anything I can!

name: Sanja Patel
description:
Hello, I am currently a Sophomore at HackNC University. I learned English by myself after moving to America at a young age. Learning it was a real struggle, especially with all of the complex grammar that English has. However, it's most definetely masterable!
My hobbies include reading and writing my own short stories. I would love to help you out!

name: Jovani Hernandez
description:
Hello, I am currently a Sophomore at HackNC University. I love learning in general, and there are several subjects that I'm interested in teaching to others!
My hobbies incldue biking and cooking! I would love to help you out with anything I can

name: Rashid Lowe
description:
Hello, I am currently a Freshman at HackNC University. This being my first year in the RealTimeTutors program, I hope that my inexpereince can be comensated with the passion that I can bring to the table!
My hobbies include running and calisethenics! I would love to help you out with anything I can.

name: William Lane
description:
Hello, I am currently a Junior at HackNC University. I'm currently pursuing a career in Health education, and I think that tutoring others would be an amazing way to build experience in training others!
My hobbies include taking naps and finding good restaurants to eat at! I would love to help you out with anything I can.

name: Sophia Chambers
description: Hello, I am currently a Sophomore at HackNC University. I love travelling and have participated in several study abroad programs! I think teaching others about culture and art is extremely important, and I would love to help you out with anything I can!

name: Miguel Mendoza
description:
Hello, I am currently a Senior at HackNC University. As someone about to get their bachelors degree in computer science, I think that my experience in the mathematics and science field could help a lot when it comes to tutoring and helping others!
My hobbies include playing golf and bowling! I would love to help you out with anything I can.

name: Tan Chu
description:
Hello, I am currently a Sophomore at HackNC University. I am currently majoring in chemistry and minoring in art, and I'm very passionate about these two subjects!
My hobbies include reading and playing video games (add me on Nintendo)! I would love to help you out with anything I can.
